DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the PK/PD of single injected human ATIII Products, SKATIII and ATIII, phase1 study in healthy male subjects was designed
DOC.brief_title: Phase1 Syudy to Evaluate the Safety and PK/PD of Human Antithrombin III
DOC.criteria: ages 19 to 40 Body weight: More than 50kg Healthy male subject Hb<14g/dL, Hct<42% ATIII hypersensitivity
